nodes.text: The Viis Empire was a government from the planet Viis. It kept the Aaroun species enslaved and bred them as servants and gladiators. The Empire was decimated by a prolonged outbreak of Mnggal-Mnggal.
The Viis and their clothing resembled a reptillian species of which a New Republic diplomat belonged to.
The Viis Empire first appeared in the book series Alien Chronicles made by Lucasfilm Ltd.. Its inclusion in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia canonizes its existence in the Star Wars universe.
